description: Lovingly maintained and thoughtfully updated! Classic 3 bedroom/2.5 bathroom Parma bungalow with plenty of "extras!" You will fall in love with the inviting and COVERED front porch, upstairs owner's suite w/ the rare FULL BATHROOM, "4 seasons room" toward the rear of the home w/ all new vinyl windows + sliding door, refinished hardwood flooring throughout the first floor, and finished basement w/ gorgeous paneled walls! Plenty of original details and charm throughout. First floor consists of a large living area, 2 generously sized bedrooms, a full UPDATED bathroom, kitchen w/ beautiful counters + "eat-in" section, and the "4 seasons room" w/ sliding door leading out to your backyard! Upstairs is a true owner's retreat w/ plenty of closet space, a full bathroom, and multiple closets. The basement is finished w/ nature stone throughout and includes your laundry area, half bathroom, and utility space. Fully fenced backyard w/ driveway gate and 2 car garage! Vinyl windows throughout + central air for year round comfort. Newer leaf guards on all gutters... This one is special - schedule your showing today!

This spacious home is ready for you to make your decorating improvements and make this your special home.  All vinyl exterior & windows make for easy maintenance, and is enhanced by a nice rear yard to create your summer entertaining space. The kitchen provides both great cabinetry and that much needed counter space. The living & dining room with all wood flooring creates a comfortable living area while the rec room gives that extra living play area in the lower level. The second floor offers the three nice size bedrooms & bath.  This is a great value.

Charming Parma Ranch – Move-In Ready! Welcome to this clean, cozy, and well-maintained ranch located in one of Parma’s most desirable neighborhoods. Convenient one-floor living—no stairs to worry about and an easy layout perfect for all ages and lifestyles. This home offers: All appliances included for a truly move-in ready experience. Low-maintenance design, ideal for busy homeowners or those looking to downsize. Peace of mind with a home warranty included. Step outside and enjoy the unbeatable location—just minutes from shopping, restaurants, entertainment, and freeway access for an easy commute. Don’t miss this rare opportunity to own a Parma ranch—schedule your private showing today!

Full of character and steady care, this 1919 Parma home has been maintained by the same owner for more than forty years. Refinished woodwork and hardwood floors highlight its original craftsmanship. The dining room features built-in cabinets, leaded glass details and a window seat. A skylight brightens the kitchen and all appliances remain. The HVAC system is serviced regularly, the hot water tank is about four years old and insulation was added to the exterior walls, roof and between floors. Replacement vinyl windows and glass block improve efficiency. Updated electric includes a new weatherhead, a new 100-amp panel, a sub panel for additional circuit capacity and a 220 spa box ready for a hot tub if a buyer chooses to add one. The basement is fully waterproofed inside and out with PVC drain tile, glass block windows and a sump pump that has never needed to run. A wood-burning fireplace converted to gas can be converted back and a new gas line was run from the home to the street. The front porch offers solid columns and a welcoming covered space. The 20x24 detached garage includes extra depth, electric, lighting and a door opener with an interior activation button. Three sides of the yard are already fenced by neighboring fences. The roof is approximately twelve years old and insulated watertight storage with lighting beneath the porch adds practical space. Most furnishings may stay or be negotiated for a turn-key move-in.

Welcome to 6704 Charles Avenue, Parma, OH — a charming Cape Cod that blends classic character with modern comfort. The crisp brick exterior and mature landscaping create an inviting first impression, while large windows fill the interior with natural light. Inside, neutral tones and original wood trim carry warmth and continuity throughout the living areas.

The living room flows easily into the dining space, where rear windows overlook a lush backyard retreat. The adjoining kitchen is efficient and timeless, offering cabinetry that complements the home’s cozy aesthetic. Two comfortable bedrooms and a full bath rest on the main floor, while upstairs you’ll find two additional bedrooms under vaulted ceilings.

Downstairs, a partially finished basement offers flexible space for a home gym, media room, or quiet office. The solid foundation, mechanical updates, and bright window well make it both functional and inviting.

Step outside to a private backyard designed for easy outdoor living. With plenty of space to add a paved patio, perfect for morning coffee or evening gatherings, while the fenced yard provides privacy for play, pets, or gardening, adding to the home’s natural appeal.

Built with durable brick construction, updated windows, and a well-maintained roof, this home is efficient, sturdy, and easy to maintain. Its manageable layout promotes effortless living, while the main floor offers accessibility with minimal stairs.

Ideally located near Parma’s parks, shops, dining, and major routes, this home provides quick access to everyday conveniences and community recreation. Whether relaxing inside or enjoying the peaceful yard, 6704 Charles Avenue offers an exceptional blend of comfort, function, and location — ready for your personal touch and the next chapter of life.

Prime Parma Duplex – Excellent Owner-Occupant or Investor Opportunity in Desirable Parma City Schools
Rarely available 4-bedroom, 2-bath duplex offering two spacious 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom units with separate utilities and separate entrances. Ideal for the owner-occupant who wants to live in one unit while the tenant pays most or all of the mortgage, or for the investor seeking immediate cash flow in one of Parma’s most sought-after neighborhoods.
This well-maintained property combines classic charm with modern updates. Both units feature beautiful hardwood floors and original woodwork throughout. The downstairs unit is completely move-in ready, freshly painted, and includes brand-new luxury vinyl plank flooring in both bedrooms. The upstairs unit is tenant-occupied by a reliable long-term tenant, is in great condition, and provides instant rental income from day one.

Recent updates include a roof that is approximately 10 years old, both furnaces (approximately 5 years old), one hot water tank replaced in 2019 and the other replaced in 2022. Exterior features include maintenance-free vinyl siding, a fully fenced backyard with a large deck perfect for entertaining, a charming covered front porch, and a rare two-car detached garage that is split into two separate one-car garages—one dedicated to each unit. Each garage is equipped with its own automatic garage door opener and exterior keypad for convenient, private access. Each unit also has its own basement with laundry hookups.

Located in the highly regarded Parma City School District, this turnkey duplex is priced to sell quickly and represents an outstanding opportunity for house-hacking, immediate rental income, or multi-generational living.
Don’t miss this gem – schedule your private showing today!

Welcome Home! Check out this solid all-brick, 3-bedroom, 1-bath home with lasting quality and plenty of potential. Located on a quiet, established street, this property offers easy access to The Shoppes at Parma, Parma Community Hospital, and nearby parks like West Creek Reservation and Big Creek Reservation. Inside, you’ll find a practical layout with good natural light and comfortable living spaces ready for your personal touch. The kitchen comes fully equipped — all appliances stay, making it move-in ready for its next owner. The one-car garage provides convenient parking and extra storage space, while the low-maintenance brick exterior adds classic curb appeal. The backyard offers room for gardening, pets, or outdoor relaxation. Whether you’re a first-time buyer, downsizing, or looking for a reliable investment, this well-built Parma home is a smart choice. Hurry, this home won't last!

This well-maintained western bungalow offers 3 bedrooms above grade and 1–2 additional bedrooms in the finished basement, providing versatile living space for a variety of needs. The home features two full bathrooms, both recently updated along with the kitchen and interior paint.

The main floor includes bright, comfortable living areas and a functional layout ideal for everyday living. The finished basement adds valuable space for a family room, home office, extra bedrooms, or guest accommodations.

Set in a quiet, established area, this single-family home combines modern updates with the convenience and comfort of bungalow living.  Reserve your private tour today !

Spectacular, Completely Remodeled rare 3 Bedroom, 2.5 BATH bungalow in the heart of Parma!*All new flooring throughout, sleek new granite kitchen & luxury baths, stainless appliances, high efficiency furnace and A/C,  rec. rm. with full bath, double hung replacement windows*Open floorplan, nice bright interior, fresh paint throughout, high-end luxury plumbing fixtures in all 3 new baths!*Up bedrm. suite has private half bath!*New Concrete Driveway!*Big fenced backyard with patio area and 3 raised beds for garden!*Like new interior, this is the home you've been waiting for*See it today

This spacious and cared for home offers over 2,000 sq ft of living space with three bedrooms, two and a half baths, 4 fireplaces and plenty of room to make it your own. Inside, you will find a large living room with decorative fireplace with hidden places for storage, formal dining room, and a bright family room addition with gas log FP that adds valuable extra living space. Huge eat in kitchen offers dec FP, W&D and convenient desk area. Second floor dormer addition provides spacious bedroom with huge private bath, built in drawers and walk in tub with shower. A walkout basement also features gas log fireplace and full bath. New carpet 1st & 2nd floor, 3 New picture windows, 2 car garage with opener. Updated breaker box for double oven, New HVAC 2019, New 50-gal HWT 2019. Updated electrical panel 13, new drive 2012, privacy fence and so much more. The home features classic character and solid bones, ready for your updates and personal touch.

Step into this well-loved ranch in Parma, offering 3 bedrooms, 1.5 baths, and over 1,336 square feet of polished, refreshed living space. Recently brightened with fresh paint and gleaming hardwood floors, every room feels inviting and ready for your personal touch. The main level features three spacious bedrooms and a full bath, anchored by a living room where natural light plays off the newly finished floors. The eat-in kitchen invites everyday gatherings, and the galley kitchen area adds convenience. The partially finished basement expands your options again, creating room for recreation, a home office, or a hobby zone, while storage under the stairs keeps clutter tucked away and gets that laundry done. Outside, you’ll appreciate the detached garage and a fully fenced backyard—ideal for summer barbecues or relaxation under the open sky. A gated driveway adds a touch of privacy, and storm doors plus awnings combine practicality with charm. Located in Parma, you’re near everyday conveniences: easy access to shops, dining, and transit options. This home is turnkey with its fresh paint and polished hardwoods. All you need to do is call it home.

Experience timeless charm blended with modern updates in this classic bungalow, offering nearly 1,600 sq ft of beautifully maintained living space. Step inside to find gleaming hardwood floors, rich natural woodwork, and thoughtful details throughout. The spacious living room is highlighted by leaded glass bookcases and a cozy gas fireplace, creating the perfect place to unwind. The dining room features charming window seating and built-in corner curio cabinets, ideal for gatherings. The updated kitchen boasts newer countertops, newer flooring, and a stylish travertine backsplash, combining functionality with character. Upstairs, the private owner’s suite feels like a true retreat, complete with a dressing area, two large closets, and a spa-like bath featuring a walk-in ceramic shower. Outdoor living is just as inviting, with a welcoming front porch perfect for morning coffee and a private stone patio in the backyard for relaxing or entertaining. Additional highlights include a 2-car garage, a new hot water tank, and a partially finished basement with a full bath, providing excellent versatility and extra space. Perfectly located near shopping, dining, parks, and freeway access, this home offers the best of Parma living. A rare find that combines old-world charm with today’s modern comforts—move right in and make it your own! Schedule your private showing today!!!

A must see. This home has been in the family for years. Each unit has 2 bedrooms, 1 bath and living and dining room.
Up unit was completed updated 10 years ago.
Exterior painted 7 years ago. Roof, furnaces and windows replaced 10 years.
2 sets of washers and dryers and stove and refrigerator up will stay .
Full basement for laundry and storage. 2 car det. garage.
Close to public transportation and shopping and highways.
Up tenant would like to stay. Down tenant moving end of Oct.
Owner would only like to entertain owner financing at this time.

This totally refurbished possibly 4 bedroom Cape cod is a turn the key must-see! Located in a highly desirable area of Parma near the Metro Parks. Also near I-480, I-71 and other major roadways. The many new updates include: Windows, Flooring thought out home, Doors, Hot water tank, Kitchen counter top – Cabinets, light fixtures, siding, roof,
Gutters, and leaf guards. All appliances stay. The basement is fully finished with a fireplace to entertain your friends. Also enjoy the breezeway for extra entertainment space. The garage is an oversized 2-car with an exit garage door into your huge backyard. Come make this your home just in time for the Holidays! The seller will look at all offers.

Picture perfect in Parma! This delightful home, clean and pristine, is poised and ready for a new beginning. A fresh coat of trendy, neutral paint, fresh LVT and polished hardwood flooring offers a clean slate for your personal touches. With a well-though main floor plan and a full-sized finished basement, that seemingly goes on FOR-EV-ER, there is plenty of room here for everyone. The backyard will knock your socks off as it is wonderfully spacious and fully fenced! There is even a separate gated garden or dog-run to keep the pristine landscaping of this backyard in tip-top condition! This is truly a unique opportunity to move into a home that offers ample space inside and out and offers the chance to move in and begin your own picture-perfect lifestyle!

**Welcome to 7609 Wooster Parkway -- Classic Charm Meets Modern Updates!** This beautifully maintained 1½-story Cape Cod in Parma offers timeless character with thoughtful upgrades throughout. The spacious living room features hardwood floors, crown molding, and a decorative fireplace with dentil molding on the mantel. An adjacent enclosed back porch faces south and provides a cozy spot to relax with backyard views. Most rooms include hardwood floors and charming decorative arches. The updated eat-in kitchen boasts tile countertops, soft-close cabinets, a deep stainless-steel sink, pendant lighting, undermount lighting and newer stainless-steel appliances. The stove has an air fryer feature. There are also pull-out drawers, a deep drawer under sink, built in cutting board and a spice cabinet/closet. There is also a flexible dining room with built-in china cabinets that can serve as a home office or third bedroom, and a convenient half bath completes the main level. Upstairs are two generously sized bedrooms -- one with a private porch -- and a remodeled full bath with a stand-up shower, wainscoting, and vintage wood-look tile. The partially finished basement adds living space with a rec room, laundry/utility area, glass block windows, and ample storage. Convenient motion sensor lights by back door for safety and convenience. Nice to have a bathroom on every floor. Major updates include a new furnace (2024) and hot water tank (2019), with central A/C easily added. A spacious 2+ car garage and convenient access to shopping, dining, highways, Metroparks, and the airport make this move-in ready gem a must-see! Near Chuppa's Marketplace and Das Schnitzel Haus! Quick closing available and be moved in and ready for the holidays!

Welcome to this inviting 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath Parma home that blends original charm with modern improvements. Step inside from the new front porch to find beautiful original hardwood floors that flow throughout the main living spaces, adding warmth and timeless appeal.

The updated eat-in kitchen features stone countertops, modern finishes, and plenty of room for gathering, perfect for everyday meals or hosting friends and family. A finished basement provides additional living space that can serve as a media room, home office, playroom, or gym.

Outside, you’ll enjoy a fully fenced backyard with a patio, offering a private area for relaxing, grilling, or entertaining. The property also includes a 2 car garage and a new hot water tank for added peace of mind. A home warranty from APHW is included.

Welcome to this beautifully updated ranch in the heart of Parma!

Step inside to discover a fully renovated kitchen featuring stunning quartz countertops, soft-close cabinets and drawers, and brand-new appliances including a refrigerator, range, microwave and dishwasher. This also has sleek luxury vinyl flooring that provides both style and durability.

Relax in the spacious living room, with plenty of natural light, fresh paint and new carpeting that creates a warm, inviting atmosphere. The generous-sized bedrooms are also newly carpeted and freshly painted.
The first-floor bathroom has been completely remodeled with modern finishes, while a second full new bathroom in the finished lower level adds convenience and versatility. The lower level offers an additional finished room perfect for a home office, recreation space, or even a guest bedroom – the possibilities are endless!

Outside, you’ll appreciate the two and a half-car garage that was built in 2001 and a private backyard, ideal for outdoor enjoyment for all ages.

Key Features:

·         Fully updated kitchen with quartz countertops & new appliances

·         Two beautifully renovated full bathrooms

·         New luxury vinyl flooring and carpeting throughout

·         Freshly painted interiors with modern touches

·         Finished lower level with flexible living space

           Vinyl windows throughout.

This home is move-in ready and offers both comfort and convenience in a fantastic location. Don’t miss the opportunity to make this stunning ranch your own!

Welcome to 6227 Ridge Road, a beautifully designed home in the heart of Parma, set back 70+ feet from the main road for added privacy and serenity. The first floor features a stylish kitchen with marble-style granite countertops, copper-toned backsplash and flooring, and stainless steel appliances. A walk-in pantry, full bathroom, and main-level laundry offer convenience and function. The open layout between the kitchen, dining room, living room, and foyer allows for effortless flow and connection, while a main floor bedroom provides privacy within the shared space. Upstairs you'll find a spacious master suite with its own full bathroom, sunlit areas throughout, and a private walk-out balcony. On the opposite side, three creatively arranged tandem rooms provide flexibility for bedrooms, office space, a nursery, or more. Outside, a long driveway leads to a three-car garage with a loft above—ideal for entertaining or hobbies. Located near major highways, shopping, and everyday conveniences, this home blends comfort, style, and practicality. Schedule a private showing today!

Welcome home to this beautifully renovated 3-bedroom, 1-bath Cape Cod featuring a 2-car detached garage and a fully fenced backyard—perfect for outdoor enjoyment! Step inside to discover a bright and inviting interior that’s been completely updated throughout. The main level offers a comfortable living area, an eat-in kitchen with modern finishes, and two spacious bedrooms along with a stylishly updated full bath. Upstairs, the entire second floor is dedicated to the private primary suite, offering a peaceful retreat. The full unfinished basement provides plenty of storage space and includes the laundry area. With thoughtful updates, classic Cape Cod charm, and true move-in ready condition, this home is the perfect blend of comfort and convenience!

Welcome home to this beautiful Colonial property, offering 3 bedrooms and 1.5 baths, featuring hardwood floors throughout the dining room and all three upstairs bedrooms. The main bath includes an updated tub/shower, sink, faucet, toilet, and cabinet. A completely updated kitchen (renovated in 2015) features newer cabinets, countertops, flooring, and all appliances will remain with the home. The living room is perfect for cozy nights, equipped with a wood-burning stove (with a 3-speed fan and catalytic converter) and a ceiling fan. Mechanic's Dream Garage: A massive 22' x 44' (968 sq. ft.) garage, capable of fitting four or more cars. It includes an exhaust fan, numerous LED lights, and new 8-foot overhead garage doors. Recent updates include. Newer roofs on both the house and the garage (2018), and new steel entry doors at the front and rear. The outdoor space provides a huge front porch and is situated on a quiet street on a larger-than-average lot for the area, the property boasts a spacious backyard with a concrete patio, ideal for entertaining. Schedule a private showing today and make this lovely home yours!

Come see this charming 3-bedroom, 1-bath Cape Cod in Parma, Ohio!
This home features a 1-car detached garage and has been beautifully refreshed inside and out. Updates include new lighting, switches, and outlets; a brand-new furnace and AC; new carpet and refinished hardwood floors; and fresh paint throughout the interior and basement. The kitchen has been completely redone with quartz countertops, new cabinetry, and a full stainless-steel appliance package. Additional highlights include new hardware, a refinished tub, and a new garage door with motor.
This move-in-ready home offers classic character with modern comfort—schedule your showing today before it’s gone!
